definition: any of various implements for tilling, mixing, or raking, a tool with a thin flat blade on a long handle used especially for cultivating, weeding, or loosening the earth around plants
to work with a tool with a thin flat blade on a long handle to cultivate, weed, or loosen the earth around plants : to use or work with a hoe (see hoe entry 1) or backhoe
examples: hoeing in the garden all day

definition: to weed, cultivate, or thin (a crop) with a hoe (see hoe entry 1)
to dress or cultivate (land) by hoeing
examples: The garden needs to be hoed.

definition: Richard March 1812–1886 son of Robert Hoe American inventor
